g.text: Requests to import data from a legacy system
request data(file name or file path)
[while CSV file has a line with valid information]
requests to select order of sorting (ascending or descending)
[if it is defined to be sorted by arrival time]
prints sorted data by Arrival Time and informs (In)sucess of the operation
[if it is defined to be sorted by center leaving time]
prints sorted data by center arrival time and informs (In)sucess of the operation
